summary: SEAT BELT MALFUNCTION!!  SINCE THE PURCHASE OF MY 2001 TAHOE...(NEW) THE BACK RIGHT PASSENGER SEATBELT CONTINUES TO LOCK UP.  IT HAS BEEN REPLACED AND "REPAIRED" SEVERAL TIMES TO NO AVAIL. I BELIEVE THERE IS A DEFECT SOMEWHERE!  I ALSO HAVE 2 FRIENDS WITH THE SAME EXACT PROBLEM!  SAME SEAT BELT.  I HAVE 2 SMALL CHILDREN AND THIS COULD BE DANGEROUS.  IS GM WAITING FOR AN ACCIDENT TO HAPPEN?
